pages.title: Invisible Markers
pages.text:
Colored markers can be dyed to appear nearly invisible on certain block types.
Green dyed markers, for example, will almost perfectly blend in with grass blocks, moss or azalea.

pages.title: Intersecting Streams
pages.text:
If you want two different ant paths to intersect, it is best to divide them into two different colors.
Remember that in order to merge the pathways' ends with the default color again, they must be more than 10 blocks apart.

pages.title: Automation
pages.text:
A few things are required to fully automate an ant stream.
To begin, you must have a self-sufficient boxer and unboxer in terms of energy consumption.
Second, you'll need two streams of ants. One for moving your items, and another for moving empty boxes from the unboxer to the boxer on the other side. You'll be able to fully automate it if you have both of these things!
